column2: -3.1764010381994714 ` Kittie Rankie at Abergeldie Castle `https://aboutaberdeen.com/Abergeldie-Castle ` French Kate (Catherine “Kittie” Rankie)
column3: a serving woman condemned as a witch and executed on Craig-na-Ban—still haunts Abergeldie Castle
column4: where she was once held in the cellars. Sightings of her ghost have been reported in the dungeon and the clock tower.
